reviews.text: A great place to stay – Euphony Gardens is highly recommended! Good relaxing complex to stay and chill after work. Ample safe space and facilities for ourselves, our dear kids, elders and pets. Jog, swim, ball games, or hit the gym, kids cycle around, elders strolling leisurely, owners walking their pets; it has a wonderful compound. Transport wise, good connectivity from MRT; ride 7 stops (8 mins) on bus 169, 860, or 980 from Springleaf MRT Stn or ride 5 stops (8 mins) on bus 169 from Yishun MRT Stn. In terms of food, there is a stretch of Shophouse eateries outside the residence, and Chong Pang Market and Food Centre is just a stroll away. And right beside Yishun MRT, there is Northpoint City, the largest mall in the North Region.

Spacious condo with all facility.. peaceful environment..
BBQ plit, Tennis court,  basketball court, swimming pool for both kids and adults, park, etc.,

Good place to stay

Euphony garden, never going back there again. Customer buy pet food or others and wasted the driver’s time and said the guard will not let you in, this is ridiculous and make people time wasted and get scolded all the time. If the customer wants to buy please don’t ask for delivery if the guard will not let the delivery guy in. If you are a customer who wants a delivery, please inform the guard immediately and which company are they from then let the customer to inform the guard of the delivery people are coming.

P.S. Never ask for any delivery request again if the guard will not let anyone in.
Come by to pick up a kid for summer camp here. Decent facility but not so friendly people living in. Currently there is construction happening in front
Serene and natural living. Downside is public transportation accessibility.
